page.title: 05Working people in Tetsworth
page.content: We asked the people who lived in the village what job they did and where they worked.Only one person, in those who replied, was out of work and 15% are retired. We sorted the workers into groups and counted the replies: Engineering 15% Service industry 15% Building 12% Management 10% Office workers 10% Health 7% Representatives 7% Farming 6% Education 3% Only 12% work in the village, 24% travel less than 5 miles, 24% travel between 5 and 10 miles and the rest go more than 10 miles to work. Nearly 25% travel to London everyday, confirming our thoughts that Tetsworth is becoming a commuter village.
